description: Sit back and put your slow cooker to work with this fall-off-the-bone lamb recipe. Then whip up a few condiments, load up your pita and enjoy.
keywords: Slow Cooker Lamb With Cucumber & Mint Vinegar
name: Slow Cooker Lamb With Cucumber & Mint Vinegar Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg Woolworths COOK butterflied lamb leg garlic & herb

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer lamb to a large bowl. Using 2 forks, shred lamb. Remove garlic cloves from bulb. Top each bread round with yoghurt, lamb, garlic, tomato, cucumber mixture, and mint leaves. Wrap to enclose and serve.
